actions.committee: House Committee on Interior and Insular Affairs
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Interior and Insular Affairs.

actions.in_committee: House Committee on Interior and Insular Affairs

official_title: A bill to confer jurisdiction on the United States Court of Claims with respect to certain claims of the Navajo Indian Tribe.

summary.text: Confers jurisdiction on the Court of Claims to hear, determine, and render judgment on specified claims of the Navajo Indian Tribe against the United States.

titles.title: A bill to confer jurisdiction on the United States Court of Claims with respect to certain claims of the Navajo Indian Tribe.
